title: Scandinavian Lands (Norway, Sweden, Denmark)
brief_description: An introduction to the geography, people, customs and standards of living of Norway, Sweden and Denmark. Explains that the Scandinavian peoples have utilized effectively the resources of the mountain, plain and sea in the development of agriculture, industry, trade and recreation.
